review.title: “Good company for Freshers and Mid level to start with...”
review.pros: Pros – 1. No timing2. No formals..3. This being small, Will get exposure to end to end in each project4. High level of visibility to the work you have done5. Company in a residential area.. Good restaurants and all near by6. Will be interacting with End client even though we are not that experienced7. Competitive Salary8. There will not be a bench like situation. Will have projects all the time.9. When i had joined company size was 25 now its 40.. So growing10. Technically competent management
review.cons: Cons – 1. high level of visibility can create issues if you have done something wrong..:)2. Bus connectivity is less.3. On the other side of IT Hubs..4. Not inside a Business park5. Delivery time pressure6. LEads and Managers will have to work along with Managerial work
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Good work.. will miss working with you.
